#summary Useful tidbits learned about RTAI.

= Introduction =

The page is meant to keep track of ideas, links, notes, etc. regarding RTAI and its setup.


= Details =

RTAI Hardware:
  * May need to use Redhat Linux to install meIII software, because of the RPM files.
  * RTAI/Linux the Measurement Instrument cards in the lab: PCI-DDA08/12 and PCI-DAS1602/12.  You can find the full list of supported measurement hardware, including NI cards, [http://www.comedi.org/hardware.html here].
